titles.title: Federal Adoption Services Act of 1993
A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S449)
Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 14.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Federal Adoption Services Act of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to permit family planning projects to offer adoption services. Requires such services to be nondiscriminatory as to race, color, religion, or national origin.
